sets.tps: 72 HP, 4 En, 24 M Def, 200 R Atk, 200 Sp
sets.detail:
200 Ranged Attack is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed with Nimble outspeeds Nimble Gargolem-Attack 
 72 HP + 24 Melee Defense makes Power Cuffs Ursoul Shadow Sprint 2HKO 
 4 Energy = 257 Energy at level 50 for (3 Psycho Blasts + 2 Dark Surges + 1 Peace of Mind)
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.detail:
200 Melee Attack is to hit as hard as possible 
 200 Speed with Nimble outspeeds Nimble Gargolem-Attack 
 20 Energy = 260 Energy at level 50 for (3 Earthquakes + 1 Rogue Assault + 2 Bulk Ups) 
 80 HP gives 11 HP from Health Amulet every turn
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
